nickname.desc: Show your current nickname or change it so I can address you differently!

role.desc:
Create or edit an existing custom color role for yourself in the server.

Example: ``role "Rachel" #4285F4``

delrole.desc: Delete your existing custom color role. You may always re-create a new one with ``role`` command.

news.desc: Check for exclusive news on upcoming events, server updates that are yet to be announced to the public!
